Name:
USS Breton
HMS Chaser
Fate:
Transferred to Royal Navy
Sold as a merchant ship; scrapped between 1972 and 1973
Class and type:
Bogue-class escort carrier (US)
Attacker-class escort carrier (UK)
Armament:
2 × 4"/50, 5"/38 or 5"/51 guns
8 × 40 mm AA guns
20 × 20 mm AA guns
Operations: Battle of the Atlantic, Arctic convoys (1943–45)
